original_text: Butter and honey shall he eat, that he may know to refuse the evil, and choose the good.
korean_text: 그가 악을 버리며 선을 택할 줄 알 때3)가 되면 엉긴 젖과 꿀을 먹을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Butter and honey shall he eat
that he may know to refuse the evil
sentences.korean_translation: 악을 거부하는 것을 알게 되려고 함
